summary: This document details an interview with Anthony Luis Zac Figueroa regarding his involvement with Jeffrey Epstein and the transportation of females for massages. Figueroa describes his relationship with Epstein, including financial transactions and the recruitment of young women for Epstein's residence. The document highlights the nature of Figueroa's activities and his observations about Epstein's operations.

persons.name: Anthony Luis Zac Figueroa

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the central figure in the investigation, with Figueroa detailing his interactions and the nature of his operations.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Maxwell is mentioned as someone who would contact Figueroa to arrange for specific girls to be brought to Epstein's residence.

persons.name: Leslie LNU

connections.description: Figueroa worked for Epstein by transporting females to his residence for massages.
Maxwell would contact Figueroa to arrange for specific girls to be brought to Epstein.
Leslie would also reach out to Figueroa regarding the transportation of girls for Epstein.

events.title: Interview of Anthony Luis Zac Figueroa
events.description: Figueroa was interviewed regarding his involvement with Epstein and the transportation of females for massages.

keyFacts: Figueroa was involved in transporting females to Epstein's residence for massages and was paid for this service.
He mentioned that he would find females at various locations, including malls and schools.
Figueroa stated that he was sometimes not paid for his services if the females brought new girls.
He described his relationship with Epstein as one where he was aware of the nature of the activities but claimed he never witnessed sexual acts.
Figueroa noted that he had a significant telephone bill that he attributed to his association with Epstein.
